name: AISeek
description: The game "Hide and seek" where AI hides and you seek it or You hides and the bot seeks you. To move, press on the button w, a, d, s. Pizza is you, but you can change your costume, just come to the cola or pizza or bubble gum and press on the button Space. The cubes are obstacles. If you are cola, you move faster than bubble gum, but if you are pizza, you move slower than bubble gum. When AI seeks, you can lose if the bot touches you and you can't win. When you seek, you can win, if you touch the bot, but AI will run away from you.
